TopicTitle: A beginners attempt at an F22

Articles.Content:
It\'s hard to take off (turn off the SAS just for take off) but when it gets off the ground it\'s extremely stable, and can even be flown without the SAS. It can fly for an extremely long time, I flew for about 10 minutes and only used of half of one of the three fuel tanks.

The design is based on an F-22, I did my best to copy it. I used the C7 pack and JellyCubes Bicoupler (http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=4886.0).

Picture of the F22 in the Spaceplane building

Right after take off

Flying steadily with SAS off
